00017 // Highest and lowest possible priorities
00018 // (higher priority tasks with small priority values)
00019 #define THREAD_PRIO_HIGH 0
00020 #define THREAD_PRIO_LOW  255  
00021 
00025 class FixedPriorityThread : public Thread {
00026 
00027  public:
00028   FixedPriorityThread(char *debugName, int priority, int period);
00029 
00031   virtual int Start(Process *owner, VoidFunctionPtr func, int arg);
00032 
00033   virtual void Finish();
00034 
00035   int GetPriority() { return priority; }
00036 
00037   void SetPriority(int prio) { priority = prio; }
00038 
00039   int GetPeriod() { return period; }
00040 
00041   void SetPeriod(int p) { period = p; }
00042 
00043   bool IsInterruptInit() { return interruptInitialized; }
00044 
00045   void SetInterruptInit(bool Int) { interruptInitialized = Int; }
00046 
00047   bool IsActive (void) { return active; }
00048 
00049   // Statistics concerning the thread (public to be more convenient)
00050   int missedDeadlines;    /* number of missed deadlines */
00051   Time maxTime, minTime;  /* minimum and maximum execution times (cycles) */
00052   int iterations;         /* number of completed task iterations */
00053   int lastNumInstruction; /* total number of instrs after the last instance */
00054   int instrInstance;      /* number of instructions for all instances (constant) */
00055  private:
00056   int priority;
00057 
00058   int period; // -1 for aperiodic tasks
00059 
00060   bool interruptInitialized; // for periodic tasks only
00061 
00062   bool active;
00063 
00064   Time startTime;  /* Instant de démarrage de la tâche (relativement aux cycles
00065                         déjà utilisés par ce process) */
00066 
00067 };
